|postal_code_type = |postal_code = |website = |footnotes = }} 'Kebili' (
{{transl|ar|QibillÄ«}} , ) is a desert town in central Tunisia and one of the
main cities in Nefzaoua. It is located at around , south of the Chott el-Jerid.
It is the capital of the Kebili Governorate.
